subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Flavia Pennetta won the biggest semifinal of her career at the East West Bank Classic in Carson, Calif., defeating the wild card Bethanie Mattek, 3-6, 6-2, 7-5. She will face top-seeded Jelena Jankovic or No. 4 Dinara Safina in the final Sunday. Jankovic can take over the No. 1 world ranking if she wins the tournament.
